with_user_count.description: Whether to include number of users subscribed to each event

id.description: The id of the guild event

guild_id.description: The guild id which the scheduled event belongs to

channel_id.description: The channel id in which the scheduled event will be hosted, or `null` if entity type is `EXTERNAL`

creator_id.description: The id of the user that created the scheduled event

name.description: The name of the scheduled event

description.description: The description of the scheduled event

scheduled_start_time.description: The time the scheduled event will start

scheduled_end_time.description: The time at which the guild event will end, or `null` if the event does not have a scheduled time to end

privacy_level.description: The privacy level of the scheduled event

status.description: The status of the scheduled event

entity_type.description: The type of hosting entity associated with the scheduled event

entity_id.description: The id of the hosting entity associated with the scheduled event

entity_metadata.description: The entity metadata for the scheduled event

creator.description: The user that created the scheduled event

user_count.description: The number of users subscribed to the scheduled event

image.description: The cover image of the scheduled event

location.description: The location of the scheduled event

username.description: The user's username, not unique across the platform

bot.description: Whether the user belongs to an OAuth2 application

system.description: Whether the user is an Official Discord System user (part of the urgent message system)

mfa_enabled.description: Whether the user has two factor enabled on their account

accent_color.description: The user's banner color encoded as an integer representation of hexadecimal color code

verified.description: Whether the email on this account has been verified

flags.description:
The flags on a user's account

See https://discord.com/developers/docs/resources/user#user-object-user-flags

premium_type.description:
The type of Nitro subscription on a user's account

See https://discord.com/developers/docs/resources/user#user-object-premium-types

public_flags.description:
The public flags on a user's account

See https://discord.com/developers/docs/resources/user#user-object-user-flags

AddUndefinedToPossiblyUndefinedPropertie.description: Allows support for TS 4.5's `exactOptionalPropertyTypes` option by ensuring a property present and undefined is valid (since JSON.stringify ignores undefined properties)

entity_metadata.description: The entity metadata of the scheduled event

AddUndefinedToPossiblyUndefinedPropertie.description: Allows support for TS 4.5's `exactOptionalPropertyTypes` option by ensuring a property present and undefined is valid (since JSON.stringify ignores undefined properties)

limit.description: Number of users to receive from the event

with_member.description: Whether to include guild member data if it exists

before.description: Consider only users before given user id

after.description: Consider only users after given user id

guild_scheduled_event_id.description: The scheduled event id which the user subscribed to

user.description: The user which subscribed to the event

member.description: The guild member data for this user for the guild which this event belongs to, if any

user.description:
The user this guild member represents

**This field won't be included in the member object attached to `MESSAGE_CREATE` and `MESSAGE_UPDATE` gateway events.**

See https://discord.com/developers/docs/resources/user#user-object

roles.description:
Array of role object ids

See https://discord.com/developers/docs/topics/permissions#role-object

joined_at.description: When the user joined the guild

premium_since.description:
When the user started boosting the guild

See https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us/articles/360028038352-Server-Boosting-

deaf.description: Whether the user is deafened in voice channels

mute.description: Whether the user is muted in voice channels

pending.description:
Whether the user has not yet passed the guild's Membership Screening requirements

*If this field is not present, it can be assumed as `false`.*

communication_disabled_until.description: Timestamp of when the time out will be removed; until then, they cannot interact with the guild
